name: Haneru no Tobira Wii: Giri Girissu
overview: "Haneru no Tobira", a popular corner, is now available on the Wii! Completely produced by the program staff, you can enjoy the "barely" of the program as it is! !! In this game, "How many" long "vaulting boxes can you jump?", "How many candles can be erased?", "High enough to jump by hopping", which were also popular at the time of airing. Includes the last minute such as "How much is it?" Anyone can enjoy it with simple operation! Is it possible to break the record of the performers? ??
